parameterToStringBuffer

private java.lang.StringBuffer parameterToStringBuffer(java.lang.String key,
                                                       java.lang.Object value,
                                                       boolean first)
Converts parameter data to key-value pair that is usable as a part of request string.

Parameters:
key - key
value - value
first - is this the first created parameter
Returns:
'key=value' with character '&' or '?' depending on the circumstances

parametersToStringBuffer

private java.lang.StringBuffer parametersToStringBuffer()
Converts all parameters to a string buffer.

Returns:
parameters in the string form, key-value pairs
